Enjoy Generous Hospitality At The Hotel

Uniquely situated just steps away from Times Square, Macy’s, the Empire State Building, Hudson Yards, New York Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, and a variety of major Midtown attractions, Hotel Penn offers a comfortable and convenient place for you to relax after a day of sightseeing, event going, or working.

Continental Breakfast

Soy or Almond milk, gluten free toast and cereal are available upon request. Please advise us of any special requirements in advance so we can prepare to accommodate these requests.
learn more

24 Hour Refreshments and so much more

Please consider the Casablanca your private club or better yet, your home away from home. Rick’s Cafe is our guests 24-hour living room where you can invite a friend or meet new friends from around the world.
learn more

For your comfort

When a guest of the Casablanca Hotel, our goal is to ensure you are as comfortable as possible.

Make Yourself at Home

At Library Hotel Collection, we want to make sure each guest feels completely at ease during their stay. Let us know if you need anything to be more comfortable!

Access to Nearby Sports Clubs

The Casablanca Hotel welcomes travelers to enjoy complimentary use of New York Sports Club with locations throughout Manhattan.
